title: Foster Youth Earned Benefits Protection for Success Program; provide for foster care under the Department of Child Protection Services.
subject: Public Health and Welfare

actions.description: Referred To Public Health and Welfare

extras.summary: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION 43-15-17, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, TO PROVIDE A FOSTER YOUTH EARNED BENEFITS PROTECTION FOR SUCCESS PROGRAM UNDER THE DEPARTMENT OF CHILD PROTECTION SERVICES AUTHORITY TO MAKE PAYMENTS FOR SUPPORTIVE SERVICES FOR FOSTER CARE; TO PROVIDE FOR THE DETERMINATION OF ELIGIBILITY AND APPLICATION PROCEDURES, THE REPRESENTATIVE PAYEE, NOTICE AND APPEALS, ANNUAL REVIEW OF ELIGIBILITY, A SUCCESS SEQUENCE MILESTONE DISBURSEMENT PROGRAM, DISBURSEMENTS UPON EXIT FROM CARE, AND TO PROVIDE THE DEPARTMENT WITH RULEMAKING AUTHORITY; AND FOR RELATED PURPOSES.
